name: Rocket Propulsion
description: Explore the fundamentals of rocket propulsion, including chemical, electric, and cold gas propulsion systems. This course covers the principles of operation, design, and optimization of rocket engines.

name: Aerodynamics
description: Dive into the study of aerodynamics, focusing on the behavior of air as it interacts with solid objects, like aircraft and spacecraft. Topics include airflow, drag, lift, and the basics of fluid dynamics.

name: Spacecraft Design
description: This course offers an in-depth look at the process of designing spacecraft, from the initial concept to the final construction. Learn about the key components of spacecraft, system integration, and the latest technologies in space exploration.
